name: Cook A Tour – Tastes Of Jerusalem
description:
Experience Jerusalem by combining an exploration of the city’s picturesque alleyways with authentic culinary highlights. Partake in cooking workshops, enjoy home hospitality, visit a chef’s studio or be treated at one of Jerusalem’s wonderful restaurants. Our special tours, providing a blend of the intellectual and the sensory, are not to be forgotten.
Cook-A-Tour is a boutique tour company, based in enchanted Jerusalem. Its leading concept is the fusion of regular touring with culinary experiences as well as meeting the locals via home hospitality. Our tours provide an unforgettable blend of the intellectual, the sensory, the cultural, the social, and, most importantly, the fun.
Inbar Regev, Cook-A-Tour founder, owner and director, is herself an experienced licensed tour guide. Inbar believes that touring and food are a winning, unforgettable blend and she sees time and again that visitors love getting to know Jerusalem this way.
